entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning near noon. Flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon then southwest 30 gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 3 in the evening then steady.
entry.summary: A few rain showers mixed with flurries early in the evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 in the evening then steady. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
